definition: A small, flying insect that collects nectar from flowers and produces a sweet, sticky substance. It is known for its ability to live in organized colonies and build intricate hives. It plays a crucial role in pollination and is commonly associated with honey production.

examples.german: Die Bienenzucht ist eine wichtige landwirtschaftliche Tätigkeit.
examples.english: Beekeeping is an important agricultural activity.
